title: Navigating to empty; editable combobox conveys role; name; editability; and state
instructions: Navigate to the 'State' combobox
assertion3: Ability to enter text is conveyed

title: Navigating by line to empty; editable combobox conveys role; editability; and state
instructions: Navigate to the 'State' combobox
assertion2: Ability to enter text is conveyed
assertion3: 2:Collapsed state is conveyed.

title: Navigating to empty; editable combobox conveys role; name; editability; and state
instructions: Navigate to the 'State' combobox
assertion3: Ability to enter text is conveyed

title: Reading empty; editable combobox conveys role; name; editability; and state
instructions: With the reading cursor on the combobox; read the combobox.
assertion3: Ability to enter text is conveyed

title: Reading empty; editable combobox conveys role; name; editability; and state
instructions: With focus on the combobox; read the combobox.
assertion3: Ability to enter text is conveyed

title: Navigating to filled; editable; collapsed  combobox conveys role; name; editability; value; and state
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on combobox; set value of 'combobox' to 'Alabama'; ensure in collapsed state.
instructions: Navigate to the 'State' combobox
assertion3: Ability to enter text is conveyed

title: Navigating to filled; editable; collapsed  combobox conveys role; name; editability; value; and state
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on combobox; set value of 'combobox' to 'Alabama'; ensure in collapsed state.
instructions: Navigate to the 'State' combobox
assertion3: Ability to enter text is conveyed

title: Reading filled; editable; collapsed combobox conveys role; name; editability; value; and state
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on combobox; set value of 'combobox' to 'Alabama'; ensure in collapsed state.
instructions: With the reading cursor on the combobox; read the combobox.
assertion3: Ability to enter text is conveyed

title: Reading filled; editable; collapsed combobox conveys role; name; editability; value; and state
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on combobox; set value of 'combobox' to 'Alabama'; ensure in collapsed state.
instructions: With focus on the combobox; read the combobox.
assertion3: Ability to enter text is conveyed

title: Navigating to filled; editable; expanded combobox conveys role; name; editability; value; and state
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on combobox; set value of 'combobox' to 'A'; ensure in expanded state.
instructions: Navigate to the 'State' combobox
assertion3: Ability to enter text is conveyed

title: Navigating by line to filled; editable; expanded combobox conveys role; editability; value; and state
instructions: Navigate to the 'State' combobox
assertion2: Ability to enter text is conveyed
assertion3: Value 'A' is conveyed.

title: Navigating to filled; editable; expanded combobox conveys role; name; editability; value; and state
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on combobox; set value of 'combobox' to 'A'; ensure in expanded state.
instructions: Navigate to the 'State' combobox
assertion3: Ability to enter text is conveyed

title: Reading filled; editable; expanded combobox conveys role; name; editability; value; and state
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on combobox; set value of 'combobox' to 'A'; ensure in expanded state.
instructions: With the reading cursor on the combobox; read the combobox.
assertion3: Ability to enter text is conveyed

title: Reading filled; editable; expanded combobox conveys role; name; editability; value; and state
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on combobox; set value of 'combobox' to 'A'; ensure in expanded state.
instructions: With focus on the combobox; read the combobox.
assertion3: Ability to enter text is conveyed

title: Navigating to editable combobox switches mode from reading to interaction
task: Navigate to combobox with keys that switch modes
instructions: Navigate to the 'State' combobox
assertion1: The screen reader switches to mode that allows text input

title: Activating editable combobox switches mode from reading to interaction
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on combobox
instructions: Activate the 'State' combobox
assertion1: The screen reader switches to mode that allows text input

title: Opening combobox conveys combobox state and optionally describes suggestion availability
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on combobox; ensure it is empty and collapsed.
instructions: Display the popup from empty combobox
assertion1: Expanded state of combobox is conveyed
assertion3: 2:Number of options available is conveyed

title: Closing combobox conveys combobox state
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on combobox; ensure it is empty and expanded.
instructions: Collapse the combobox popup
assertion1: Collapsed state of combobox is conveyed

title: Activating 'States' button opens combobox and conveys name; role; editability; and state
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on 'States' button; Ensure combobox is empty and collapsed.
instructions: Activate the button that displays the list of states.
assertion3: Ability to enter text is conveyed

title: Activating 'States' button opens combobox and conveys name; role; editability; and state
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on 'States' button; Ensure combobox is empty and collapsed.
instructions: Activate the button that displays the list of states.
assertion3: Ability to enter text is conveyed

title: Activating 'States' button closes combobox and conveys collapsed state
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on 'States' button; Ensure combobox is expanded.
instructions: Activate the button that hides the list of states.

title: Activating 'States' button closes combobox and conveys collapsed state
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on 'States' button; Ensure combobox is expanded.
instructions: Activate the button that hides the list of states.

title: Navigating into popup from empty combobox conveys role; name; properties; and states of the popup and selected option
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on combobox; ensure it is empty.
instructions: Navigate into the popup from the empty combobox
assertion1: Role 'listbox' is conveyed for the popup.
assertion3: Name of focused option is conveyed; e.g.; 'Alabama' if first option; 'Wyoming' if last option.
assertion4: Position in set of the focused option is conveyed; e.g.; 1 of 56 if first option; 56 of 56 if last option.

title: Typing portion of valid value to open popup conveys changes in combobox state and value selection
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on combobox; ensure it is empty.
instructions: Type 'a' in the empty combobox
assertion1: Either 1) The selected text 'labama' is conveyed or 2) The entire value 'Alabama' is conveyed.
assertion2: The selected state of of the value option 'Alabama' is conveyed.
assertion3: The combobox state change from collapsed to expanded is conveyed
assertion4: 2:The position in set of the selected option is conveyed; e.g.; 1 of 4 suggestions.

title: Navigating popup conveys name and properties of the selected option
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on combobox; press down arrow 2 times.
instructions: Navigate through options in the popup listbox
assertion1: The name of the focused option is conveyed; e.g.; 'American Samoa'
assertion2: 2:Role listbox or role option is conveyed
assertion3: 2:The position in set of the focused option is conveyed; e.g.; 3 of 56

title: Reading popup item conveys name and properties of the selected option
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on combobox; press down arrow 2 times.
instructions: With focus on an item in the popup listbox; read the item.
assertion1: Name of focused option is conveyed; e.g.; 'Alaska'
assertion2: 2:Role listbox or role option is conveyed
assertion3: 2:The position in set of the focused option is conveyed; e.g.; 2 of 56

title: Reading popup item conveys name and properties of the selected option
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on combobox; press down arrow 2 times.
instructions: With focus on an item in the popup listbox; read the item.
assertion1: Name of focused option is conveyed; e.g.; 'Alaska'
assertion2: 2:Role listbox or role option is conveyed
assertion3: 2:The position in set of the focused option is conveyed; e.g.; 2 of 56

title: Activating option in popup conveys combobox role; name; editability; value; and state
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on combobox; press down arrow 2 times.
instructions: Choose 'Alaska' from the listbox.
assertion3: Ability to enter text is conveyed

title: Canceling option selection conveys combobox role; name; editability; value; and state
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on combobox; type 'A'; down arrow 2 times.
instructions: Collapse the combobox popup
assertion3: Ability to enter text is conveyed

title: Initiating caret movement from listbox conveys combobox value
setupScriptDescription: Set focus on combobox; press down arrow 2 times.
instructions: Start caret movement in the textbox while focus is in the listbox
assertion3: 2:Name 'State' is conveyed
